categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Willard Waylin was a human male who served as a mechanic in the navy of the Galactic Empire. Waylin graduated from Arkanis Academy, along with his fascination with Imperial design and his eidetic memory, made him an unparalleled mechanic. Following the Battle of Endor, Waylin served as the chief mechanic aboard the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Overseer.
